```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

df <- read_csv("~/GitHub/honours-project/gold data/XAU_ZAR Historical Data.csv") %>%
  mutate(
    Date  = as.Date(Date, format = "%m/%d/%Y"),
    Price = as.numeric(gsub(",", "", Price))
  ) %>%
  arrange(Date)

ggplot(df, aes(x = Date, y = Price)) +
  geom_point(size = 1, alpha = 0.6) +
  labs(title = "XAU/ZAR Price over time",
       x = NULL, y = "Price (ZAR per ounce)") +
  theme_minimal()

```
